articles.author: AP
articles.title: Omicron COVID update: Germany bans unvaccinated people from swathe of venues as broader lockdown looms - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Another European nation is considering a broad vaccine mandate after it recorded its highest daily COVID death toll in nine months.
articles.content: Unvaccinated people across Germany will soon be excluded from nonessential stores, restaurants and sports and cultural venues, Chancellor Angela Merkel announced Thursday, and parliament will conside… [+4963 chars]

articles.author: Theto Mahlakoana
articles.title: Nigeria backs SA in criticism of travel bans over Omicron COVID variant - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Several countries including the UK, US and Rwanda have moved to ban southern Africans from travelling to their shores after scientists in South Africa identified the new variant which has since been found in several European countries as well.
